text: [Music]
how should I design my first
VPC Amazon virtual private Cloud VPC for
shorts lets you provision an isolated
section of the cloud to run your AWS
resources and a network that you
control when planning your VPC Network
design there are several considerations
first consider the network range often
referred to as a cider block that you
will use it should not overlap with the
existing IP space used by your
organization and also allow for future
growth Next plan how your VPC cider
block will be divided across the subnets
you provision in each availability Zone
remember availability zones are separate
isolated locations within a
region finally consider the workloads
you will be running in your VPC and how
users and systems will access these
applications your workloads might
require public or private subnets as
well as routes to your organization's
Network through a VPN connection or
dedicated connection to your premises
with AWS Direct Connect for more
detailed answers on VPC design please
visit aws.amazon.com anwers
[Music]
